title: Inquiry-Based Social Studies Simulation Education Design: Practitioner Competency Enhancement Using IDM

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational theories in social studies education and experience in managing science curricula
context.additional_context: Customized training for in-service teachers to learn how to integrate social inquiry elements into science curricula

learning_goals: Learners can design inquiry-based lesson plans integrated with science curricula by applying the IDM model.
Learners can explain methods for observing students' inquiry processes and providing feedback in VR simulation environments.
Learners can generate five or more interpretive questions connecting social studies academic language with scientific phenomena.
Learners can develop an evaluation system linking inquiry-based learning outcomes to civic life.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
